Articles.Content:
Hey there, KSP forum!

Being my first post and all this is rather embarrassing, but I have a problem

I downloaded Kosmos\' Parts pack and it overwrites your original parts. Being the idiot I am I forgot to back up the originals! If there is any way to get them back or a file online where the originals are at I would be much obliged if you can tell me

Thanks!

Lol sorry. I tried and It didn\'t work before but does now

Thanks

Also, to build on Nibula\'s post, it\'s preferable to back up your game before installing any mods. A bad install of a plugin, or messing with the .cfg of certain parts without knowing what you\'r doing, can lead to disaster.
I always have two copies of the game. I have one folder with the default download, I then copy this to a new folder specifically for modded versions.

I downloaded Kosmos\' Parts pack and it overwrites your original parts.

I\'m curious about this statement as I too have that pack installed but none of my original files were modified. Can you tell us which parts were overwritten?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I always have two copies of the game. I have one folder with the default download, I then copy this to a new folder specifically for modded versions.

Me too. It makes recovering from a mod incompatibility a piece of cake. Saves having to unzip again.

Me too. It makes recovering from a mod incompatibility a piece of cake. Saves having to unzip again.

GME makes it even easier with a click of a button.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I\'m curious about this statement as I too have that pack installed but none of my original files were modified. Can you tell us which parts were overwritten?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

It says in the Forum post that you should remove your original parts or 'bad things will happen'... I have installed mods before and this is the first time I forgot to back it up
What they meant was, if you have a previous version of Kosmos, you should get rid of them first, not your default parts
